name: Shiinotic
author: Mizue
flavor_text: It emits flickering spores that cause drowsiness. When its prey succumb to sleep, this Pokémon feeds on them by sucking in their energy.

abilities.name: Illuminate
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your deck for a {G} Pokémon, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Flickering Spores
attacks.effect: Your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Asleep.
